New Records: Corbin Carroll hit a go-ahead grand slam in the 8th inning to even the three-game series at a game apiece
Key Match Events: Corbin Carroll hit a go-ahead grand slam in the 8th inning to even the three-game series at a game apiece
The D-backs rallied in the 8th to beat the Mets, 8-5
The Mets stormed back to score four runs in the 5th and another in the 6th to go up 5-4
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs are without three key pieces of their lineup right now with Christian Walker, Ketel Marte and Gabriel Moreno all on the injured list
Post-Match Reflections: Carroll said he's not trying to be the team's 'hero', he's just trying to do something to help the team win every day
D-backs manager Torey Lovullo said the team was battling frustration in the middle innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The D-backs have a 21-4 record since July 29 and a +64 run differential, leading all of baseball
Corbin Carroll has turned his season around in August, slashing.267/.333/.656 with 9 of his 17 homers coming in that stretch
